goodbye: Thanks for playing Sean's Tic Tac Toe!

invalidTurnChoice: The only valid options are 1, 2 or 3
getUserPlayAgain: Would you like to play again? (y/n)
invalidPlayAgain: Invalid answer - would you like to play again? (y/n)

rules: The player who gets three of their marker in a row wins the round!
rules2:
At start of a series, you will choose who goes first. Each round, it will switch.
